text: Anke Fuchs (5 July 1937 â€“ 14 October 2019) was a German lawyer and politician. She was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. She was Federal Minister for Youth, Family and Health in 1982 and as Vice President of the Bundestag from 1998 through 2002. From 2003 until 2010, she was the President of the Friedrich Ebert Foundation. Fuchs was born in Hamburg. Fuchs died on 14 October 2019 Wilhelmshaven, Germany at the age of 82.Trauer um SPD-Politikerin und Ex-Gesundheistsministerin Anke Fuchs ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German lawyers Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth ministers of Germany Category:Health ministers of Germany
title: Anke Fuchs
